body:
Comment 1: 
We spent a while thinking about this a few months ago but
decided not to do it.  It would require storing another value
in the slice structure [1] and doesn't seem to be useful enough
to justify the complexity and storage costs.

[1] http://research.swtch.com/2009/11/go-data-structures.html
_Labels changed: added **language-change**._ _Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WontFix**._
